long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Tired of filling out endless forms? Meet iAutofill, your ultimate solution for quick and hassle-free data entry! Our smart extension saves you time by securely storing your profiles and auto-filling forms with just a click. With features like email validation, customizable profiles, and easy integration with your favorite websites, iAutofill makes online interactions smoother than ever. Experience the freedom of automatic form filling and take control of your online experience today!



Update Version [1.1]
Release Date: [10/October/2020]

New Features:

Added Activate button for enhanced software management.
Introduced Save Profile button to streamline profile storage.
Improvements:

Optimized response times for a smoother user experience.
Bug Fixes:

Resolved an issue where profiles wouldn't save properly.
Security Updates:

Implemented advanced encryption methods for stored profiles, enhancing data protection.
Strengthened authentication processes to prevent unauthorized access to sensitive user information.
